name: WUBEN G5 Rechargeable EDC Flashlight, 400 Lumens Dual Light Sources Mini Flashlight with RGB Light, Portable Flat Pocket Flashlights, Magnetic Keychain Flashlight for Outdoor Home Emergencies (Black)
short_description: RECHARGEABLE EDC FLASHLIGHT: WUBEN G5 is a small and powerful flashlight suitable for daily use. It has multiple lighting modes, with a maximum lumen of 400 lumens and a maximum irradiation distance of 82m. The size is 1.47 in x 0.59 in x 2.44 in and the overall weight is only 52.3g. It can be easily put into pockets, backpacks or key chains for easy carrying. It can easily handle situations whether it is for camping in the wild, hiking adventures or family emergencies POWERFUL DUAL-LIGHT-SOURCE MINI FLASHLIGHT: It adopts an LED dual-bead system and has multiple lighting modes. The main light is cold white light with 3 adjustable modes (low, medium, high). The gear can be easily switched by sliding the pulley switch. The auxiliary light is RGB light with 7 colors (red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue, purple). The colors can be cyclically changed by sliding the pulley switch. Beacon Mode: In the RGB mode, double-click the button to activate the beacon flashing function of the current color. Warning Light Mode: In the off state, double-click the button to enter the RGB warning flashing function 180-DEGREE ROTATABLE LAMP HEAD AND CLIP：The novel rotatable lamp head and clamp design enables flexible adjustment of the lighting direction, meeting diverse scenario needs and achieving multi-angle lighting. During outdoor adventures, night patrols, etc., when there's a need to view from different angles, simply rotate the lamp head or clamp to accurately project light where it's needed, such as in cave exploration, machine maintenance, reading, cycling, and tent setup during outdoor camping TYPE-C FAST CHARGING AND SUPERIOR IP68 WATERPROOFING：This rechargeable flashlight has a simple and clear button design. Sliding it upward charges the flashlight, allowing easy operation even in the dark. It takes only 1.5 hours to fully charge, and the flashlight can last up to 65 hours at the lowest brightness. With an IP68 waterproof rating, it can endure the harshest environments MAGNETIC FLASHLIGHT: The hands-free design allows it to attach to various metal surfaces such as car hoods, vehicle frames, refrigerators, and iron doors. In scenarios where both hands are needed, like vehicle maintenance, equipment inspection, and housework, it can fix the flashlight in a suitable position to provide illumination, enabling you to focus on your work and improve efficiency Minimalist Design with Powerful Functions: Stepless Dimming: In the white light mode, rotate the knob clockwise to adjust the flashlight brightness from low to high. Quick Ultra-Brightness: In the white light mode, double-click the knob to enter the ultra-bright state, and double-click again to return to the original state. Flashlight Lock: When the push button is pushed to the lock mode, any operation will have no respons

name: WUBEN E7 1800 Lumen Rechargeable Mini Flashlight with Magnet - Super Bright 6 Modes EDC Flashlight, Typ-C Rechargeable LED; IP68 Pocket Flashlight for Headlamp Use, Rescue, Camping
short_description: PERSONALIZED EDC FLASHLIGHT: WUBEN E7 is a multi-purpose EDC flashlight that shows your personality. The appearance is stylish and trendy, equipped with P9 high color rendering 6500K LED lamp beads, which can provide high output up to 1800 lumens and 175° ultra-wide-angle floodlight. SUPER BRIGHT 6 MODES: WUBEN E7 rechargeable flashlights have 6 lighting modes: High/Med/Low/Super Bright/Strobe/SOS, with memory function；Click the switch and long press to trigger the gear selection; double click to light up the super bright mode; three clicks to burst flash mode; four consecutive clicks to lock the flashlight，Avoid turning on the flashlight by accidental touch. IP68 WATERPROOF & REECHARGEABLE: The overall body of the flashlight has a true waterproof design inside, made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy with micro-arc oxidation process. If you forget to cover our charging hole for something and accidentally drop it into water, it will not damage the inside of our flashlight. Equipped with 1100 mAh rechargeable battery, it only takes 1.5 hours to fully charge. Red and blue battery indicator light let you know the battery level at any time. MULTI-FUNCTION EDC FLASHLIGHT: WUBEN E7 flashlight is an EDC flashlight with a strong magnet on the bottom to firmly hold iron objects, also has a hugging clip on the back to easily attach it to jacket pockets, backpacks, gears, waistbands; you can also put it into the headlamp clip (not included) to use it as a headlamp; you can plug in a Typ-c cable to control the use of the flashlight through the gesture remote sensor (not included), it's easy to carry and simple to use. YOU WILL GET: E7 Flashlight × 1, Rechargeable Battery × 1, Type-C Charging Cable × 1, Spare O-Ring × 2, User's Manual, Warranty Card × 1; If you have any questions about how to use the product or how to mix and match parts, please contact us!
